text: Congratulations to our JPHCOPH doctoral student Dr. Randall Ford. Dr. Ford is also a dentist and as such was eligible to receive a COVID-19 vaccine in the first round (end of December 2019)! Congratulations Dr. Ford! #jphcoph #georgiasouthern #publichealth #covid19 #vaccine https://t.co/cRpC1ENGr9
